name: 郭霽慶
objective: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicines, etc. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discussed in this course.
schedule:

Concept of organic chemistry for Specialty Chemicals

Physico-Chemical properties of Specialty Chemicals– 1
Physico-Chemical properties of Specialty Chemicals– 2 

Synthesis of Specialty Chemicals- Generalities

Characterization and Application of Specialty Chemicals
